alert.header_text: COVID-19 service reduction
alert.desc: Due to COVID-19 service reductions, Line 32 will run weekdays on reduced service between Milwaukie and Oregon City Transit Center. For weekday service to Clackamas Community College, 4 trips will leave Milwaukie at SE Jackson & 21st, at 6:57 a.m., 1:06 p.m., 3:06 p.m., and 5:06 p.m., serving all regular stops. For weekday service to Milwaukie City Center, 4 trips will leave Oregon City Transit Center at 6:30 a.m., 8:29 a.m., 2:38 p.m., and 4:38 p.m., serving all regular stops. Weekend service will be on Sunday schedule.

alert.header_text: COVID-19 service reductions
alert.desc: Due to COVID-19 service reductions, trains will be running every 45 minutes. For arrivals and trip planning, see trimet.org.
No service to northbound stop at N Greeley & Sumner (Stop ID 2226) due to the Adidas Project.
No service to the westbound stop on N Killingsworth & Vancouver (Stop ID 3184) due to long-term construction. Use the temporary stop at NE Killingsworth & N Williams (Stop ID 3187).
No service to eastbound SE Powell & 99th (Stop ID 14018) due to construction. Temp stop 130 ft east of stop.

alert.header_text: The eastbound stop on Powell & Powell Garage Dr (#4542) is closed due to construction.

Beginning Monday, September 28 through end of service Friday, October 9th, no service to northbound NW Graham Rd & 257th Dr & 257th Way (Stop ID 9470) due to construction.

alert.header_text: Gresham MAX Improvements
alert.desc: From Sunday, October 11, through Saturday, October 17, MAX Blue Line will be disrupted due to Gresham MAX Improvements. Shuttle buses will serve stops near stations from Rockwood/E 188th Ave to Cleveland Ave. For more information, see trimet.org/gresham.
No service to the southbound stop on NW Murray & Science Park Dr (Stop ID 4086) due to sidewalk construction.

Beginning Sunday, August 30th through Saturday, January 2nd, MAX Red Line will be disrupted due to construction at Portland International Airport. Shuttle buses will be serving from Mt Hood Ave to Airport.

alert.header_text: Face covering required on TriMet
alert.desc: To help keep transit safe for riders and employees, face coverings are required on board.

No service to Molalla & Mountain View (Stop ID 11933, 11932) due to construction.
